data.title: Wilhelm Fuhrmann - Bierwirth & Kluth
data.meta_description: Bierwirth & Kluth paart das Know How erfolgreicher, internationaler Hotelketten mit dem individuellen Fachwissen seiner Mitarbeiter auf allen wesentlichen Gebieten moderner Betriebsführung.
data.text:
With the company since / responsible for

Wilhelm Fuhrmann has been working at B&K since December 2021, first as Chief Engineer at the Renaissance Vienna Hotel and since May 2023 as Director of Engineering. In this role, he is responsible for all technical issues in the regions Vienna and South of Germany.

In addition, he is jointly responsible for strategic issues in the engineering team. The focus is on a sustainable, legally compliant and project-oriented support for B&K Hotels.

Short vita

Trained industrial mechanic/operational technology

Degree in technical management for health care facilities followed by a professional doctorate in public health

Professionally versatile and diverse industry experience in technical, social and health care environment

Sound knowledge in risk, quality and project management

Motto / Philosophy
